references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the core 3D Gaussian splatting technique which the current work builds upon and adapts for X-ray imaging.

references.paper_title: Fast auto-differentiable digitally reconstructed radiographs for solving inverse problems in intraoperative imaging
references.reason: This paper introduces a differentiable DRR rendering approach, which is a key concept extended and improved by the current work.

references.paper_title: Radiative Gaussian splatting for efficient X-ray novel view synthesis
references.reason: This paper applies Gaussian splatting to X-ray imaging, providing a direct antecedent to the current work's approach.

references.paper_title: Fast calculation of the exact radiological path for a three-dimensional CT array
references.reason: This foundational paper presents an analytical method for DRR generation, forming a baseline against which the current work improves.

references.paper_title: DeepDRR-A catalyst for machine learning in fluoroscopy-guided procedures
references.reason: This paper introduces a deep learning-based DRR rendering method, providing a comparison point for the proposed method's accuracy and efficiency.
